channel.title: Stuck in a door [Fixed]
channel.description:
Hello!
I'm at the beginning of the game. I took the hazard suit and headed down an elevator. However, as the elevator was going doing, I decided to just go ahead and and drop down the the next floor instead. However, the door was looked, so I waited.
When the elevator caught up, there was a loading screen. After that, the doors opened. However, only one side (the one opposite of me) of the door opened. The side where I am didn't open. Probably because I'm blocking it. However, it is also blocking me. So I'm stuck. Getting crushed. and gonna have to restart.
:frowning:

item.title: Stuck in a door [Fixed]

item.description:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13985

I also listed this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck in a door [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: kevindqc
item.description:
Hello!

I’m at the beginning of the game. I took the hazard suit and headed down an elevator. However, as the elevator was going doing, I decided to just go ahead and and drop down the the next floor instead. However, the door was looked, so I waited.

When the elevator caught up, there was a loading screen. After that, the doors opened. However, only one side (the one opposite of me) of the door opened. The side where I am didn’t open. Probably because I’m blocking it. However, it is also blocking me. So I’m stuck. Getting crushed. and gonna have to restart.

Read full topic
